channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Your reusable water bottle may be a breeding ground for strep and fecal bacteria. Here’s how to keep it clean
item.description: You’d be surprised at what might be growing inside your water bottle.

item.title: Anthony Scaramucci had a strong 2024 — and crypto investments were a factor
SPACs — or ‘blank-check companies’ — are back. What could possibly go wrong?
Buffett sold more BofA stock while keeping Apple stake intact
item.description: Berkshire Hathaway cut its stake in the bank to 8.9% in the fourth quarter after selling 117.5 million shares.

item.title: Uber’s CEO says no one wants to compete with Tesla—or Elon Musk
item.description: Tesla's Cybercab, or robo-taxi, was announced last October and is due to hit the roads in Texas this June as part of a trial roll-out.

item.title: Growth stocks are doing well in 2025 — no thanks to the ‘Magnificent Seven’
These 20 companies should run up numbers that justify the new ‘growth mindset’
Mexico’s President Sheinbaum said her government would ask Google to make ‘Mexican America’ pop up on maps of the U.S.
item.description: Sheinbaum has repeatedly defended the name Gulf of Mexico, saying its use dates to 1607 and is recognized by the United Nations.

item.title: TikTok is back in the Apple and Google app stores in the U.S.
item.description: TikTok was removed from Apple and Google’s app stores on Jan. 18 to comply with a law that requires Chinese parent company ByteDance to divest the app...

item.title: AMD may be doing better in AI than Wall Street thinks
